sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: TimIt offer a complete solution to benchmark an application. It is an API which provide some advanced timing and event observing services. Benchmarking your ProActive application will permit you to enhance performance of it. Thanks to generated statistics charts, you will be able to determine critical points of your application.

Different kind of statistics can be done. You can setup different timers with hierarchical capabilities and see them in charts. Event observers can be placed to study, for example, communication pattern between your application's workers.

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para:
TimIt provide different kind of services :
Timer counters will help you to time some piece of code in your application.
Event observers will help you to keep an eye on different events that occur in your application.
By combining these services, you will be able to measure many parameters of your application. TimIt package contains few examples for using these services in your application.
